metadata.title: CVE-2021-20188 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in podman before 1.7.0. File permissions for non-rootusers running in a privileged container are not correctly checked. Thisflaw can be abused by a low-privileged user inside the container to accessany other file in the container, even if owned by the root user inside thecontainer. It does not allow to directly escape the container, though beinga privileged container means that a lot of security features are disabledwhen running the container. The highest threat from this vulnerability isto data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: libpod package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
